home.heroTitle: The smart system makes accounting easier and faster, reads data from invoices in various formats
home.heroDescription: If a person can read the account, so can
home.whyItemThree: PROCESSES LARGE AMOUNTS OF INVOICES AT ONCe
home.whyItemSix: it only costs what you use
home.howItemOne: Scan or photograph paper bills and upload them to
home.howItemTwo: Wait for the invoices to be digitized.
home.howItemThree: Show which account corresponds to which ledger account. Next month, the program will automatically assign ledger accounts.
home.howItemFour: will prepare invoices for import into your accounting program and provide import files that you will upload to your accounting with a few clicks (or automatically).
home.payTitle: You pay for what you use
home.paySubtitle: The more invoices you process, the less you pay per invoice.
home.scansTitle: “Robodam Scan” reads the following data from the account:
home.scanItemFive: details of the Seller and the Buyer;
home.scanItemTen: A sign that the bill is paid in cash.
home.scanItemTwelve: Company name / Name of a natural person Surname;
home.scanItemThirteen: Company code / Individual activity number of a natural person / Personal code;
home.scanItemSeventeen: Company details are always checked with the country's registry centers and corrected if necessary. Therefore, if 'ivesk.lt' notices that the company is not fully described in the invoice, you will still receive the complete and most relevant details of the company.
home.scanItemNineteen: Assigns the amount to the correct Expense/Income code;
home.scanItemTwentyOne: Adds the account to the non-closed VAT period;

prices.title: You pay for what you use
prices.subtitle: Robodam Scan is charged per document per month and you pay as you upload documents. The cost per document is calculated based on the number of documents uploaded per month according to this pricing table:
prices.textOne: Cost per line for digitizing a detailed document
prices.example: You uploaded 1300 documents, you will pau: 250 * 0,3 + 250 * 0,285 + 500 * 0,27 + 300 * 0,255 = 358,75€ + VAT. On average, one document will cost 27,5 cents.
prices.exemptText: duplicate documents, non-invoices and unreadable documents. *Prices do not include VAT. We issue an invoice for the services on the last day of the month for all processed documents.

howItWorks.title: How does “Robodam scan” work?
howItWorks.textOne: {scan} is a service for digitizing and importing purchase and sales invoices into the accounting system.
howItWorks.textTwo: The digitization of {scan} brings together the accounts faster, better and cheaper than what a person can do by hand. The system understands invoices in any format and in any language and does not require any additional preparation, configuration or intervention from you.
howItWorks.subtitle: Using “Robodam Scan” an accountant uploads invoices to his accounting system in 3 steps:
howItWorks.step1: The accountant receives a personal connection to the {scan} system, through which he uploads purchase/sale invoices.
howItWorks.step2: The {scan} system scans them and prepares them for import into the accounting system. The accountant connects to {scan} and takes account data in the appropriate format for his accounting program.
howItWorks.step3: The accountant then imports the account data into his accounting program using the standard functionality of the accounting program.
howItWorks.functionalitiesOneRight: Processes large amounts of invoices at once
howItWorks.functionalitiesTwoRight: Company details are checked at the Register Center
howItWorks.functionalitiesThreeRight: Reads information from invoices in various formats
howItWorks.functionalitiesFiveLeft: Reads bills in foreign languages ​​as well
howItWorks.functionalitiesSixLeft: The system can be accessed from anywhere
howItWorks.functionalitiesSixRight: You can send invoices by e-mail
howItWorks.functionalitiesSevenLeft: You can transfer the eArchive to GDrive
howItWorks.functionalitiesSevenRight: You can import invoices from GDrive
howItWorks.functionalitiesEightLeft: You can have as many connections as you need
